stbroadcast_conn Struct Reference
Stubborn best-effort local area broadcast

A stbroadcast connection. More...

#include </cygdrive/e/share/contiki/core/net/rime/stbroadcast.h>

Detailed Description

A stbroadcast connection.

This is an opaque structure with no user-visible fields. The stbroadcast_open() function is used for setting up a stbroadcast connection.
